headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From Waters Corporation’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Waters Corporation delivered a solid first quarter in 2025, with management pointing to strong double-digit growth in analytical instrument sales—particularly in liquid chromatography and mass spectrometry—as a primary driver. CEO Udit Batra credited robust demand from pharmaceutical and industrial customers, as well as momentum in emerging high-volume testing areas like PFAS and GLP-1, for the company's performance. Management also highlighted the effectiveness of commercial execution and ongoi
